1.desc: Effectiveness of recovery items +15%.

2.desc: Effectiveness of recovery items +25%.

1.desc: Damage +9% to foes with 30% or lower HP.

2.desc: Damage +22% to foes with 30% or lower HP.

3.desc: Damage +36% to foes with 30% or lower HP.

1.desc: Atk./Move Speed +3%.

2.desc: Atk./Move Speed +8%.

3.desc: Atk./Move Speed +15%

1.desc: Attacking a foe creates an Ether that only you can collect. On collecting the Ether, Atk. Power +0.2% for 90s and All Defense +0.3%. Stacks up to 30 times. Chance on Ether collection to increases the stack by 3. (Cooldown: 10s)

2.desc: Attacking a foe creates an Ether that only you can collect. On collecting the Ether, Atk. Power +0.3% for 90s and All Defense +0.6%. Stacks up to 30 times. Chance on Ether collection to increases the stack by 3. (Cooldown: 10s)

3.desc: Attacking a foe creates an Ether that only you can collect. On collecting the Ether, Atk. Power +0.5% for 90s and All Defense +1%. Stacks up to 30 times. Chance on Ether collection to increases the stack by 3. (Cooldown: 10s)

1.desc: Damage +3% when your HP is above 80%.

2.desc: Damage +8% when your HP is above 80%.

3.desc: Damage +16% when your HP is above 80%.

1.desc: Cutting skill Lv. +1.

2.desc: Cutting skill Lv. +2.

3.desc: Cutting skill Lv. +3.

1.desc: Damage +4% to Boss or above monsters. Incoming Damage +20%.

2.desc: Damage +10% to Boss or above monsters. Incoming Damage +20%.

3.desc: Damage +20% to Boss or above monsters. Incoming Damage +20%.

1.desc: Become invincible while using your Movement Skill.
Charge skills' charging speed +8%. Damage +4%.

2.desc: Charge skills' charging speed +20%. Damage +10%.

3.desc: Charge skills' charging speed +40%. Damage +20%.

1.desc: Incoming Damage -5% while Pushed.

2.desc: Incoming Damage -15% while Pushed.

3.desc: Incoming Damage -30% while Pushed.

1.desc: Movement Skill Cooldown -10%.

2.desc: Movement Skill Cooldown -15%.

3.desc: Movement Skill Cooldown -20%.

1.desc: Fury Meter remains at max and turns into Mayhem Mode with the power of darkness. Mayhem Mode: Outgoing Damage +3%, Atk. and Move Speed +15%, all incoming Damage -72%. When Mayhem Mode activates, HP is reduced to 25% of Max HP; this cannot be exceeded even when healing is applied. Can only receive 40% of healing and 25% of shield. Press the <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT> key to cancel Mayhem Mode and recover 25% of Max HP; cannot enter Mayhem Mode again for 30s.

2.desc: Fury Meter remains at max and turns into Mayhem Mode with the power of darkness. Mayhem Mode: Outgoing Damage +8%, Atk. and Move Speed +15%, all incoming Damage -72%. When Mayhem Mode activates, HP is reduced to 25% of Max HP; this cannot be exceeded even when healing is applied. Can only receive 40% of healing and 25% of shield. Press the <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT> key to cancel Mayhem Mode and recover 25% of Max HP; cannot enter Mayhem Mode again for 30s.

3.desc: Fury Meter remains at max and turns into Mayhem Mode with the power of darkness. Mayhem Mode: Outgoing Damage +18%, Atk. and Move Speed +15%, all incoming Damage -72%. When Mayhem Mode activates, HP is reduced to 25% of Max HP; this cannot be exceeded even when healing is applied. Can only receive 40% of healing and 25% of shield. Press the <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT> key to cancel Mayhem Mode and recover 25% of Max HP; cannot enter Mayhem Mode again for 30s.

1.desc: Max number of Esoteric Orbs +1. Esoteric skills inflict +8% Damage per Esoteric Orb you have.

2.desc: Max number of Esoteric Orbs +1. Esoteric skills inflict +10% Damage per Esoteric Orb you have.

3.desc: Max number of Esoteric Orbs +1. Esoteric skills inflict +12% Damage per Esoteric Orb you have.

1.desc: Changing Stances enhances your weapon. Crit Rate +20% for 9s.

2.desc: Changing Stances enhances your weapon. Crit Rate +25% for 9s.

3.desc: Changing Stances enhances your weapon. Crit Rate +30% for 9s.

1.desc: If Firepower Level 1 or more, Overheat is triggered. Normal Skill Damage +7% and Firepower Meter duration +10s. When not in Barrage Mode, incoming Damage -5%.

2.desc: If Firepower Level 1 or more, Overheat is triggered. Normal Skill Damage +14% and Firepower Meter duration +12s. When not in Barrage Mode, incoming Damage -10%.

3.desc: If Firepower Level 1 or more, Overheat is triggered. Normal Skill Damage +28% and Firepower Meter duration +14s. When not in Barrage Mode, incoming Damage -15%.

1.desc: Damage +100% to Lucky monsters.

2.desc: Damage +100% to Lucky monsters.

3.desc: Damage +100% to Lucky monsters.

1.desc: Phy. or Mag. Defense value increased to match whichever is highest.
Attacks have a chance to create an Ether within 8 meters. (Cooldown: 60s)

2.desc: Attacks have a chance to create an Ether within 8 meters. (Cooldown: 30s)

3.desc: Attacks have a chance to create an Ether within 8 meters. (Cooldown: 10s)

1.desc: When receiving fatal Damage, become invincible for 3s, recovering 50% of the Damage taken during invincibility as HP. Resets Movement Skill cooldown. (Cooldown: 15m)

2.desc: When receiving fatal Damage, become invincible for 3s, recovering 50% of the Damage taken during invincibility as HP. Resets Movement Skill cooldown. (Cooldown: 12m)

3.desc: When receiving fatal Damage, become invincible for 3s, recovering 50% of the Damage taken during invincibility as HP. Resets Movement Skill cooldown. (Cooldown: 9m)

1.desc: +10% Crit Damage but your attacks have a chance to deal -20% Damage.

2.desc: +25% Crit Damage but your attacks have a chance to deal -20% Damage.

3.desc: +50% Crit Damage but your attacks have a chance to deal -20% Damage.

1.desc: Stagger attack effectiveness +6%.

2.desc: Stagger attack effectiveness +18%.

3.desc: Stagger attack effectiveness +36%.

2.desc: Piercing skills lv. +2.

3.desc: Piercing skills lv. +3.

2.desc: Destruction skill Lv. +2

3.desc: Destruction skill Lv. +3

1.desc: Max MP +5%.

2.desc: Max MP +15%.

3.desc: Max MP +30%.

1.desc: MP Recovery +5%. When MP is at 50% or below, Damage to foes +3%.

2.desc: MP Recovery +15%. When MP is at 50% or below, Damage to foes +6%.

3.desc: MP Recovery +30%. When MP is at 50% or below, Damage to foes +12%.

1.desc: During Burst, Outgoing Damage +16%. After Burst, Exhaustion does not occur.

2.desc: During Burst, Outgoing Damage +25%. After Burst, Exhaustion does not occur.

3.desc: During Burst, Outgoing Damage +36%. After Burst, Exhaustion does not occur.

1.desc: Damage to foes +30%, but you can no longer gain Esoteric Meter.

2.desc: Damage to foes +40%, but you can no longer gain Esoteric Meter.

3.desc: Damage to foes +50%, but you can no longer gain Esoteric Meter.

1.desc: Natural recovery speed of Stamina Energy +300%. Stamina Skill Damage +25%. Shock Skill Damage -30%. Gain 3 Tenacious Power when using Stamina Skills. Gain Paralysis Immunity in Tenacity Release state.

2.desc: Natural recovery speed of Stamina Energy +450%. Stamina Skill Damage +35%. Shock Skill Damage -30%. Gain 4 Tenacious Power when using Stamina Skills. Gain Paralysis Immunity in Tenacity Release state.

3.desc: Natural recovery speed of Stamina Energy +600%. Stamina Skill Damage +45%. Shock Skill Damage -30%. Gain 5 Tenacious Power when using Stamina Skills. Gain Paralysis Immunity in Tenacity Release state.

1.desc: Shock Skill Damage +10% and 5% of Shock Energy consumed upon using Shock Skill will be returned. Atk. Speed +20% in Tenacity Release status, but duration decreases by 5s.

2.desc: Shock Skill Damage +15% and 10% of Shock Energy consumed upon using Shock Skill will be returned. Atk. Speed +20% in Tenacity Release status, but duration decreases by 5s.

3.desc: Shock Skill Damage +20% and 20% of Shock Energy consumed upon using Shock Skill will be returned. Atk. Speed +20% in Tenacity Release status, but duration decreases by 5s.

1.desc: Can only use Handgun Stance. Handgun Skill Damage +35%. Awakening Skill Clay Bombardment Damage +20%. Stagger Damage +40%. Movement Skill is replaced with Relentless Assault. Each hit with Handgun Skill decreases the Cooldown of Movement Skill by 0.1s.

2.desc: Can only use Handgun Stance. Handgun Skill Damage +55%. Awakening Skill Clay Bombardment Damage +35%. Stagger Damage +40%. Also, Movement Skill is replaced with Relentless Assault. Each hit with Handgun Skill decreases the Cooldown of Movement Skill by 0.1s.

3.desc: Can only use Handgun Stance. Handgun Skill Damage +75%. Awakening Skill Clay Bombardment Damage +50%. Stagger Damage +40%. Also, Movement Skill is replaced with Relentless Assault. Each hit with Handgun Skill decreases the Cooldown of Movement Skill by 0.1s.

1.desc: Barrage Skill Damage +5%. Barrage Skill Crit Rate +20%. Barrage Meter Gain +30%. Does not enter in cooling state. Gain 70% Firepower Meter upon entering Barrage Mode.

2.desc: Barrage Skill Damage +12%. Barrage Skill Crit Rate +30%. Barrage Meter Gain +30%. Does not enter in cooling state. Gain 70% Firepower Meter upon entering Barrage Mode.

3.desc: Barrage Skill Damage +20%. Barrage Skill Crit Rate +40%. Barrage Meter Gain +30%. Does not enter in cooling state. Gain 70% Firepower Meter upon entering Barrage Mode.

1.desc: Your outgoing Damage from Serenade of Courage +10% and Crit Rate +10%.

2.desc: Your outgoing Damage from Serenade of Courage +15% and Crit Rate +10%.

3.desc: Your outgoing Damage from Serenade of Courage +20% and Crit Rate +10%.

1.desc: When the recovery effect ends, an additional recovery effect is activated, recovering 8% of your Max HP.

2.desc: When the recovery effect ends, an additional recovery effect is activated, recovering 16% of your Max HP.

3.desc: When the recovery effect ends, an additional recovery effect is activated, recovering 24% of your Max HP.

1.desc: When using a Gravity Release Skill, Crit Rate +3% and Crit Damage +6% based on the amount of Cores used.

2.desc: When using a Gravity Release Skill, Crit Rate +4% and Crit Damage +12% based on the amount of Cores used.

3.desc: When using a Gravity Release Skill, Crit Rate+5% and Crit Damage +18% based on the amount of Cores used.

1.desc: Gravity Meter +20% upon using Gravity Release Skill. In Hypergravity Mode, Crit Rate of basic attacks and Vortex Gravity +10%. Outgoing Damage +4%. When the Hypergravity Skill hits the same foe 3 times, cause a "Gravity Shock" which inflicts additional Damage. Damage inflicted by Gravity Shock is influenced by Hypergravity Skill Damage.

2.desc: Gravity Meter +45% upon using Gravity Release Skill. In Hypergravity Mode, Crit Rate of basic attacks and Vortex Gravity +20%. Outgoing Damage +10%. When the Hypergravity Skill hits the same foe 3 times, cause a "Gravity Shock" which inflicts additional Damage. Damage inflicted by Gravity Shock is influenced by Hypergravity Skill Damage.

3.desc: Gravity Meter +70% upon using Gravity Release Skill. In Hypergravity Mode, Crit Rate of basic attacks and Vortex Gravity +30%. Outgoing Damage +20%. When the Hypergravity Skill hits the same foe 3 times, cause a "Gravity Shock" which inflicts additional Damage. Damage inflicted by Gravity Shock is influenced by Hypergravity Skill Damage.

1.desc: Enhances the Ancient Elemental Skill. Elemental Orb cost -1. Normal Skill Damage and Ancient Elemental Skill Damage +2% and Crit Rate +3%.

2.desc: Enhances the Ancient Elemental Skill. Elemental Orb cost -1. Normal Skill Damage and Ancient Elemental Skill Damage +10% and Crit Rate +8%.

3.desc: Enhances the Ancient Elemental Skill. Elemental Orb cost -1. Normal Skill Damage and Ancient Elemental Skill Damage +20% and Crit Rate +16%.

1.desc: Maririn, Pauru, Elcid, Shurdi, and Kelsion: Summon duration +5%, Damage +15%, Atk. Speed +3%, Move Speed +3%, and Command Skill Cooldown -3%.

2.desc: Maririn, Pauru, Elcid, Shurdi, and Kelsion: Summon duration +10%, Damage +25%, Atk. Speed +6%, Move Speed +6%, and Command Skill Cooldown -6%.

3.desc: Maririn, Pauru, Elcid, Shurdi, and Kelsion: Summon duration +20%, Damage +35%, Atk. Speed +10%, Move Speed +10%, and Command Skill Cooldown -10%.

1.desc: 4-stack Ruin Damage +20%. When Ruin hits, recover 30% of consumed MP.

2.desc: 4-stack Ruin Damage +25%. When Ruin hits, recover 30% of consumed MP.

3.desc: 4-stack Ruin Damage +30%. When Ruin hits, recover 30% of consumed MP.

1.desc: Adds Emperor Cards to the Card Deck. Balance and Judgment Cards are replaced with Chancellor and Sovereign Cards. Normal Skill Damage +25%.

2.desc: Adds Emperor Cards to the Card Deck. Balance and Judgment Cards are replaced with Chancellor and Sovereign Cards. Normal Skill Damage +35%. Emperor Card Damage +30%.

3.desc: Adds Emperor Cards to the Card Deck. Balance and Judgment Cards are replaced with Chancellor and Sovereign Cards. Normal Skill Damage +45%. Emperor Card Damage +80%.

1.desc: Stand Up Action Cooldown -4% .

2.desc: Stand Up Action Cooldown -12%.

3.desc: Stand Up Action Cooldown -25%.

1.desc: Atk. Power +4% when not in a Party or Raid.

2.desc: Atk. Power +8% when not in a Party or Raid.

3.desc: Atk. Power +12% when not in a Party or Raid.

1.desc: Guardians' whereabouts are always displayed on the map. This effect is applied to all of your party members.
Normal skills Damage +25%. Shield Amount +30% in Defensive Stance. Damage +2% for 10s when hit and when hitting while in Defensive Stance (stacks up to 3 times, once every 1s).

2.desc: Normal skills Damage +27.5%. Shield Amount +40% in Defensive Stance. Damage +3% for 10s when hit and when hitting foes while in Defensive Stance (stacks up to 3 times, once every 1s).

3.desc: +30% Normal skills damage. +50% Shield Amount in Defensive Stance. +4% Damage for 10s when hit and when hitting foes while in Defensive Stance (stacks up to 3 times, once per second).

1.desc: Gunlance skill Damage and Crit Rate +5%. Crit Damage +30%. Battlefield Shield cannot be used. Shield Meter consumption during Defensive Stance +100%.

2.desc: Gunlance skill Damage and Crit Rate +10%. Crit Damage +40%. Battlefield Shield cannot be used. Shield Meter consumption during Defensive Stance +100%.

3.desc: Gunlance skill Damage and Crit Rate +15%. Crit Damage +50%. Battlefield Shield cannot be used. Consumption of the Shield Meter during Defensive Stance +100%.

1.desc: Incoming Damage is reduced proportional to HP lost. (Max. 5%)

2.desc: Incoming Damage is reduced proportional to HP lost. (Max. 15%)

3.desc: Incoming Damage is reduced proportional to HP lost. (Max. 30%)

1.desc: On successful Counter Attack, Atk. Power +4%. For 3s Countered target takes +2% Damage from all party members.

2.desc: On successful Counter Attack, Atk. Power +10%. For 3s Countered target takes +4% Damage from all party members.

3.desc: On successful Counter Attack, Atk. Power +20%. For 3s Countered target takes +8% Damage from all party members.

1.desc: Damage to shields +16%.

2.desc: Damage to shields +50%.

3.desc: Damage to shields +100%.

1.desc: Outgoing Damage +3% at 50% or lower HP.

2.desc: Outgoing Damage +8% at 50% or lower HP.

3.desc: Outgoing Damage +16% at 50% or lower HP.

1.desc: When attacked, there is a 20% chance of activating Divine Protection which reduces the Damage received by 60%. (Cooldown: 60s)

2.desc: When attacked, there is a 20% chance of activating Divine Protection which reduces the Damage received by 60%. (Cooldown: 20s)

3.desc: When attacked, there is a 20% chance of activating Divine Protection which reduces the Damage received by 60%. (Cooldown: 10s)

1.desc: All Defense +20%. This additional Defense is immune to Defense Reduction effects.

2.desc: All Defense +50%. This additional Defense is immune to Defense Reduction effects.

3.desc: All Defense +100%. This additional Defense is immune to Defense Reduction effects.

1.desc: Bomb/grenade Battle Item carrying limit +1.

2.desc: Bomb/grenade Battle Item carrying limit +2.

3.desc: Bomb/grenade Battle Item carrying limit +3.

1.desc: Become immune to all Status Ailments while affected by shields, but -90% Shields' HP and Defensive Stance's Damage absorption amounts. (Not applicable to Battlefield Shield)

2.desc: Become immune to all Status Ailments while affected by shields, but -75% Shields' HP and Defensive Stance's Damage absorption amounts. (Not applicable to Battlefield Shield)

3.desc: Become immune to all Status Ailments while affected by shields, but -50% Shields' HP and Defensive Stance's Damage absorption amounts. (Not applicable to Battlefield Shield)

1.desc: Attacks summon temporary soldiers that Damage foes. (Cooldown: 75s)

2.desc: Attacks summon temporary soldiers that Damage foes. (Cooldown: 30s)

3.desc: Attacks summon temporary soldiers that Damage foes. (Cooldown: 15s)

1.desc: When attacking Challenge or lower monsters with full HP, your attack is a guaranteed crit with +30% Damage.

2.desc: When attacking Challenge or lower monsters with full HP, your attack is a guaranteed crit with +80% Damage.

3.desc: When attacking Challenge or lower monsters with full HP, your attack is a guaranteed crit with +160% Damage.

1.desc: Damage to staggered foes +7.5%.

2.desc: Damage to staggered foes +20%.

3.desc: Damage to staggered foes +40%.

1.desc: Attacks have a 60% chance of generating a lightning orb. These lightning orbs can only be generated once every 4s. When 5 orbs are created, they explode and Damage surrounding foes.

2.desc: Attacks have a 60% chance of generating a lightning orb. These lightning orbs can only be generated once every 2s. When 5 orbs are created, they explode and Damage surrounding foes.

3.desc: Attacks have a 60% chance of generating a lightning orb. These lightning orbs can only be generated once every 1s. When 5 orbs are created, they explode and Damage surrounding foes.

1.desc: Atk. Power +3%. Healing -25%, natural recovery excluded.

2.desc: Atk. Power +8%. Healing -25%, natural recovery excluded.

3.desc: Atk. Power +16%. Healing -25%, natural recovery excluded.

1.desc: Atk. Power +1% for 15s after killing a foe. (Max. 5 stacks)

2.desc: Atk. Power +1.5% for 25s after killing a foe. (Max. 6 stacks)

3.desc: Atk. Power +2.5% for 40s after killing a foe. (Max. 7 stacks)

1.desc: Damage +5% for successful back attacks.

2.desc: Damage +12% for successful back attacks.

3.desc: Damage +25% for successful back attacks.

1.desc: When obtained, Ethers deal Mag. Damage equal to 50% of your Max HP.

2.desc: When obtained, Ethers deal Mag. Damage equal to 75% of your Max HP.

3.desc: When obtained, Ethers deal Mag. Damage equal to 100% of your Max HP.

1.desc: Stacks up to +5% MP Recovery every 3s while you are not attacked. When the maximum stack is reached, skill Cooldown -3%. Being hit removes 1 stack of the effect. A new stack cannot be gained for 10s.

2.desc: Stacks up to +10% MP Recovery every 3s while you are not attacked. When the maximum stack is reached, skill Cooldown -6%. Being hit removes 1 stack of the effect. A new stack cannot be gained for 10s.

3.desc: Stacks up to +15% MP Recovery every 3s while you are not attacked. When the maximum stack is reached, skill Cooldown -10%. Being hit removes 1 stack of the effect. A new stack cannot be gained for 10s.

1.desc: 10% chance when using a Movement Skill to reset its Cooldown.

2.desc: 12% chance when using a Movement Skill to reset its Cooldown.

3.desc: 30% chance when using a Movement Skill to reset its Cooldown.

1.desc: Damage to foes while shielded +3%.

2.desc: Damage to foes while shielded +8%.

3.desc: Damage to foes while shielded +16%.

1.desc: Outgoing Damage +10% of basic Move Speed bonus percentage.

2.desc: Outgoing Damage +22% of basic Move Speed bonus percentage.

3.desc: Outgoing Damage +45% of basic Move Speed bonus percentage.

1.desc: Awakening Skill Cooldown -10%. +1 maximum use.

2.desc: Awakening Skill Cooldown -25%. +2 maximum uses.

3.desc: Awakening Skill Cooldown -50%. +3 maximum uses.

1.desc: Energy does not go below 1, but additional Energy Recovery effect is not applied during Hype or Combat Resource Recovery. If Energy is 30% or below, Damage to foes +5%.

2.desc: Energy does not go below 1, but additional Energy Recovery effect is not applied during Hype or Combat Resource Recovery. If Energy is 30% or below, Damage to foes +10%.

3.desc: Energy does not go below 1, but additional Energy Recovery effect is not applied during Hype or Combat Resource Recovery. If Energy is 30% or below, Damage to foes +18%.

1.desc: Awakening Skill Damage +5%. When using Hype, enter level 3 immediately. While in Hype Mode, Energy recovery speed +300%, Damage +20%.

2.desc: Awakening Skill Damage +10%. When using Hype, enter level 3 immediately. While in Hype Mode, Energy recovery speed +300%, Damage +30%.

3.desc: Awakening Skill Damage +20%. When using Hype, enter level 3 immediately. While in Hype Mode, Energy recovery speed +300%, Damage +40%.

1.desc: Summons Silverhawk MK-II, allowing Move Speed +4%, Silverhawk's Crit Rate +10%, Basic AoE Radius +60%, and Silverhawk's summon duration +30%. On Basic Attack or Wings of Storm hit, foes get a Mark of Death. Outgoing Damage +4%. Additionally, when Silverhawk is summoned Atk. Power +2%.

2.desc: Summons Silverhawk MK-II, allowing Move Speed +4%, Silverhawk's Crit Rate +20%, Basic AoE Radius +60%, and Silverhawk's summon duration +60%. On Basic Attack or Wings of Storm hit, foes get a Mark of Death. Outgoing Damage +8%. Additionally, when Silverhawk is summoned Atk. Power +5%.

3.desc: Summons Silverhawk MK-II, allowing Move Speed +4%, Silverhawk's Crit Rate +40%, Basic AoE Radius +60%, and Silverhawk's summoning duration +100%. On Basic Attack or Wings of Storm hit, foes get a Mark of Death. Outgoing Damage +15%. Additionally, when Silverhawk is summoned, Atk. Power +10%.

1.desc: On hit, outgoing Damage +3% if Silverhawk isn't summoned. When using Last Rush, recover 50% of the remaining Hawk Meter. Adds Mark of Death II to hit targets which increases their incoming Damage by 20% for 8s.

2.desc: On hit, outgoing Damage +7% if Silverhawk isn't summoned. When using Last Rush, recover 50% of the remaining Hawk Meter. Adds Mark of Death II to hit targets which increases their incoming Damage by 25% for 8s.

3.desc: On hit, outgoing Damage +12% if Silverhawk isn't summoned. When using Last Rush, recover 50% of the remaining Hawk Meter. Adds Mark of Death II to hit targets which increases their incoming Damage by 30% for 8s.

1.desc: 10% chance of obtaining an additional Ability Stone.

2.desc: 20% chance of obtaining an additional Ability Stone.

3.desc: 30% chance of obtaining an additional Ability Stone.

1.desc: Encumbered Speed +15%.

2.desc: Encumbered Speed +30%.

3.desc: Encumbered Speed +45%.

1.desc: Obtain materials once more per ore vein when using Mining Bomb.
Net Fishing is always available, but it costs 5 Fishing Tools.
Cut down trees of a rank higher than your current logging level.
3% chance of a sapling sprouting up where you logged.

2.desc: 7% chance of a sapling sprouting up where you logged.

3.desc: 10% chance of a sapling sprouting up where you logged.

1.desc: 2% chance while foraging to gather twice the amount.

2.desc: 4% chance while foraging to gather twice the amount.

3.desc: 6% chance while foraging to gather twice the amount.

1.desc: 2% chance to discover a larva after foraging.

2.desc: 4% chance to discover a larva after foraging.

3.desc: 6% chance to discover a larva after foraging.

1.desc: 4% chance that your allotted skill uses won't decrease while carving.

2.desc: 8% chance that your allotted skill uses won't decrease while carving.

3.desc: 12% chance that your allotted skill uses won't decrease while carving.

1.desc: Excavation minigames are easier, with a +30% chance of extra loot.
Mining Tool Rank +1.
Mining Tool Moonlight Miner cost -1.
Mining Bomb Cooldown -12%.

2.desc: Mining Bomb Cooldown -24%.

3.desc: Mining Bomb Cooldown -36%.

1.desc: Fishing Tool Rank +1.
15% chance to get extra items while Mystery Point Fishing.

2.desc: 30% chance to get extra items while Mystery Point Fishing.

3.desc: 45% chance to get extra items while Mystery Point Fishing.

1.desc: Throw Bait uses higher quality bait, increasing the duration of This Is The Big One to 110s.

2.desc: Throw Bait uses higher quality bait, increasing the duration of This Is The Big One to 130s.

3.desc: Throw Bait uses higher quality bait, increasing the duration of This Is The Big One to 150s.

1.desc: Logging Tool Rank +1.
50% chance to reset Cooldown of Kick Tree is used.
Foraging Tool Rank +1.
8% chance that your allotted skill uses won't decrease while foraging.

2.desc: 12% chance that your allotted skill uses won't decrease while foraging.

3.desc: 16% chance that your allotted skill uses won't decrease while foraging.

1.desc: Hunting Tool Rank +1.
Machete hits paralyzes huge prey, regardless of the rank of the machete you have equipped.
Chance for a Golden Rabbit +4% when using Search or Prey Searching.

2.desc: Chance for a Golden Rabbit +8% when using Search or Prey Searching.

3.desc: Chance for a Golden Rabbit +12% when using Search or Prey Searching.

1.desc: Excavating Tool Rank +1.
4% chance upon digging to discover an additional treasure chest.

2.desc: 8% chance upon digging to discover an additional treasure chest.

3.desc: 12% chance upon digging to discover an additional treasure chest.

1.desc: Sniffer Dog Cooldown -60%.
In addition to acquiring Flurry / Focus when switching stance, gain 40% of opposite stance's effects.

2.desc: In addition to acquiring Flurry / Focus when switching stance, gain 60% of opposite stance's effects.

3.desc: In addition to acquiring Flurry / Focus when switching stance, gain 100% of opposite stance's effects.

1.desc: Cannot use Focus Stance. Flurry Skill Damage +22%, Dual Meter gain +50%. Cooldown of Movement Skills decrease by 2s when the Dual Meter is consumed.

2.desc: Cannot use Focus Stance. Flurry Skill Damage +33%, Dual Meter gain +75%. Cooldown of Movement Skills decrease by 2s when the Dual Meter is consumed.

3.desc: Cannot use Focus Stance. Flurry Skill Damage +44%, Dual Meter gain +100%. Cooldown of Movement Skills decrease by 2s when the Dual Meter is consumed.

1.desc: Deathblade Surge skill Damage -30%. When Art is activated, Death Orb is immediately consumed to activate Deathblade Surge. Atk. Power +6%, Move Speed +6%, Atk. Power +10%, +20%, +30% for 30s according to the number of Death Orbs consumed.

2.desc: Deathblade Surge skill Damage -30%. When Art is activated, Death Orb is immediately consumed to activate Deathblade Surge. Atk. Power +9%, Move Speed +9%, Atk. Power +12%, +24%, +36% for 30s according to the number of Death Orbs consumed.

3.desc: Deathblade Surge skill Damage -30%. When Art is activated, Death Orb is immediately consumed to activate Deathblade Surge. Atk. Power +12%, Move Speed +12%, Atk. Power +15%, +30%, +45% for 30s according to the number of Death Orbs consumed.

1.desc: Activates the top level of Deathblade Surge, which unleashes the same powerful Attack regardless of the number of Death Orbs available. When skills other than basic attacks hit while in Death Trance state, Surge Enhancement effects will stack in proportion to the number of hits. This effect increases Damage dealt through Deathblade Surge by up to 40%. Damage doubles at the max stack of 60 stacks. When Death Trance ends, gain up to 100% Death Orb Meter according to the number of Surge Enhancement stacks.

2.desc: Activates the top level of Deathblade Surge, which unleashes the same powerful Attack regardless of the number of Death Orbs available. When skills other than basic attacks hit while in Death Trance state, Surge Enhancement effects will stack in proportion to the number of hits. This effect increases Damage dealt through Deathblade Surge by up to 55%. Damage doubles at the max stack of 60 stacks. When Death Trance ends, gain up to 100% Death Orb Meter according to the number of Surge Enhancement stacks.

3.desc: Activates the top level of Deathblade Surge, which unleashes the same powerful Attack regardless of the number of Death Orbs available. When skills other than basic attacks hit while in Death Trance state, Surge Enhancement effects will stack in proportion to the number of hits. This effect increases Damage dealt through Deathblade Surge by up to 80%. Damage doubles at the max stack of 60 stacks. When Death Trance ends, gain up to 100% Death Orb Meter according to the number of Surge Enhancement stacks.

1.desc: Normal Skill Damage +20%. Shadowburst Meter +50% for all skills. Disables Demonize.

2.desc: Normal Skill Damage +28%. Shadowburst Meter +50% for all skills. Disables Demonize.

3.desc: Normal Skill Damage +36%. Shadowburst Meter +50% for all skills. Disables Demonize.

1.desc: The Composure effect does not activate when Demonize ends. Upon Demonize, Demon Skill Cooldown is reset.

2.desc: The Composure effect does not activate when Demonize ends. Upon Demonize, Demon Skill Cooldown is reset, and Crit Rate +15% while Demonic Mode is active.

3.desc: The Composure effect does not activate when Demonize ends. Upon Demonize, Demon Skill Cooldown is reset, and Crit Rate +30% while Demonic Mode is active.

1.desc: Punishment Damage +15%. When Punishment skill hits, Piety Meter gain +100%. Duration of Sacred Executioner +100%.

2.desc: Punishment Damage +22.5%. When Punishment hits, Piety Meter gain +100%. Duration of Sacred Executioner +125%.

3.desc: Punishment Damage +30%. When Punishment hits, Piety Meter gain +100%. Duration of Sacred Executioner +150%.

1.desc: With Holy Aura, Damage received -10% and 2% of Max HP restored every 2.5s for all party members.

2.desc: With Holy Aura, Damage received -15% and 2% of Max HP restored every 2s for all party members.

3.desc: With Holy Aura, Damage received -20% and 2% of Max HP restored every 1.5s for all party members.

1.desc: Increases Normal Skill, Drone Skill, and Joint Skill Damage by 16%. Battery max capacity +10%. Upgraded drone technology increases Drone Move Speed. When using a Joint Skill or retrieving the drone with <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT>, Drone Defense System triggers every 10s, generating a Shield that has 2% of Max HP for 5s. Additionally, when the drone is attached to the Machinist, caster's Move Speed +10%.

2.desc: Increases Normal Skill, Drone Skill, and Joint Skill Damage by 22%. Battery max capacity +15%. Upgraded drone technology increases Drone Move Speed. When using a Joint Skill or retrieving the drone with <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT>, Drone Defense System triggers every 10s, generating a Shield that has 4% of Max HP for 5s. Additionally, when the drone is attached to the Machinist, caster's Move Speed +10%.

3.desc: Increases Normal Skill, Drone Skill, and Joint Skill Damage by 32%. Battery max capacity +20%. Upgraded drone technology increases Drone Move Speed. When using a Joint Skill or retrieving the drone with <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT>, Drone Defense System triggers every 10s, generating a Shield that has 8% of Max HP for 5s. Additionally, when the drone is attached to the Machinist, caster's Move Speed +10%.

1.desc: During Hypersync Mode, on hit, Sync Skill Damage +6% and Cooldown for Sync skills excluding Movement skills and Stand Up skills -0.5s. Also, Cooldown of Sync skills is reset when entering Hypersync Mode, and it returns 40% of its Core Energy cost when canceled.

2.desc: During Hypersync Mode, on hit, Sync Skill Damage +12% and Cooldown for Sync skills excluding Movement skills and Stand Up skills -0.5s. Also, Cooldown of Sync skills is reset when entering Hypersync Mode, and it returns 40% of its Core Energy cost when canceled.

3.desc: During Hypersync Mode, on hit, Sync Skill Damage +21% and Cooldown for sync skills excluding Movement skills and Stand Up skills -0.5s. Also, Cooldown of Sync skills is reset when entering Hypersync Mode, and it returns 40% of its Core Energy cost when canceled.

1.desc: Chaos Meter +50%. Atk. Power +12% and Crit Rate +3% when the Chaos Meter is full.

2.desc: Chaos Meter +50%. Atk. Power +18% and Crit Rate +5% when the Chaos Meter is full.

3.desc: Chaos Meter +50%. Atk. Power +25% and Crit Rate +8% when the Chaos Meter is full.

1.desc: Upon switching to Persona Mode, gain the "Lunar Voice" effect instead of the Swoop Enhancement effect that stacks every second. Upon gaining the "Lunar Voice" effect, Swoop skill Damage +120%, Atk. Speed +10%, and "Shadow Step" skill cooldown is reset.

2.desc: Upon switching to Persona Mode, gain the "Lunar Voice" effect instead of the Swoop Enhancement effect that stacks every second. Upon gaining the "Lunar Voice" effect, Swoop skill Damage +135%, Crit Rate +5%, Atk. Speed +10%, and "Shadow Step" skill cooldown is reset.

3.desc: Upon switching to Persona Mode, gain the "Lunar Voice" effect instead of the Swoop Enhancement effect that stacks every second. Upon gaining the "Lunar Voice" effect, Swoop skill Damage +150%, Crit Rate +10%, Atk. Speed +10%, and "Shadow Step" skill cooldown is reset.

1.desc: Frontal attack Damage +5%

2.desc: Frontal attack Damage +12%

3.desc: Frontal attack Damage +25%

1.desc: Atk. Speed +8% for 9s in Handgun Stance. Crit Rate +10% and Outgoing Damage +10% for 9s in Shotgun Stance. Outgoing Damage +16% for 9s while in Rifle Stance.

2.desc: Atk. Speed +12% for 9s in Handgun Stance. Crit Rate +10% and Outgoing Damage +17% for 9s in Shotgun Stance. Outgoing Damage +22% for 9s while in Rifle Stance.

3.desc: Atk. Speed +16% for 9s in Handgun Stance. Crit Rate +10% and Outgoing Damage +24% for 9s in Shotgun Stance. Outgoing Damage +28% for 9s while in Rifle Stance.

1.desc: Crit Rate +22%. Unable to use Shotgun Stance.

2.desc: Crit Rate +33%. Crit Damage +6%. Unable to use Shotgun Stance.

3.desc: Crit Rate +45%. Crit Damage +15%. Unable to use Shotgun Stance.

1.desc: Max number of Esoteric Orbs +1. Esoteric skills consume all Esoteric Orbs and inflict +17% Damage per Esoteric Orb consumed.

2.desc: Max number of Esoteric Orbs +1. Esoteric skills consume all Esoteric Orbs and inflict +26% Damage per Esoteric Orb consumed.

3.desc: Max number of Esoteric Orbs +1. Esoteric skills consume all Esoteric Orbs and inflict +35% Damage per Esoteric Orb consumed.

1.desc: Only 1 Esoteric Orb is used when using Esoteric Skill, and Esoteric Skill Damage +15%.

2.desc: Only 1 Esoteric Orb is used when using Esoteric Skill, and Esoteric Skill Damage +22%.

3.desc: Only 1 Esoteric Orb is used when using Esoteric Skill, and Esoteric Skill Damage +30%.

1.desc: When Arcane Torrent is triggered, remaining skills Cooldown -50% (except Movement Skills and Awakening Skills). During Arcane Torrent, Crit Rate +12% and Crit Damage +20%.

2.desc: When Arcane Torrent is triggered, remaining skills Cooldown -50% (except Movement Skills and Awakening Skills). During Arcane Torrent, Crit Rate +20% and Crit Damage +37%.

3.desc: When Arcane Torrent is triggered, remaining skills Cooldown -50% (except Movement Skills and Awakening Skills). During Arcane Torrent, Crit Rate +30% and Crit Damage +55%.

1.desc: Disables Arcane Rupture, but Damage of skills (except Awakening and Movement skills) +16% and Cooldown -3%.

2.desc: Disables Arcane Rupture, but Damage of skills (except Awakening and Movement skills) +22% and Cooldown -6%.

3.desc: Disables Arcane Rupture, but Damage of skills (except Awakening and Movement skills) +28% and Cooldown -10%.

1.desc: Atk. Speed -10%, Atk. Power +4%.

2.desc: Atk. Speed -10%. Atk. Power +10%.

3.desc: Atk. Speed -10%. Atk. Power +18%.

1.desc: After using a Movement Skill, Damage of skills (excluding Basic Attack and Awakening Skills) +3% for 5s.

2.desc: After using a Movement Skill, Damage of skills (excluding Basic Attack and Awakening Skills) +8% for 5s.

3.desc: After using a Movement Skill, Damage of skills (excluding Basic Attack and Awakening Skills) +16% for 5s.

1.desc: Damage of attacks other than Back Attack and Frontal Attack +3%. Does not apply to Awakening Skills.

2.desc: Damage of attacks other than Back Attack and Frontal Attack +8%. Does not apply to Awakening Skills.

3.desc: Damage of attacks other than Back Attack and Frontal Attack +16%. Does not apply to Awakening Skills.

1.desc: When "!!!!!" is entered into normal chat, Sight Focus is activated for 6s. After the effect is activated, offensive skill Damage +8%. Only half of the effect is applied to Awakening Skills. Does not apply to Basic Attack. Cooldown: 30s.

2.desc: When "!!!!!" is entered into normal chat, Sight Focus is activated for 6s. After the effect is activated, offensive skill Damage +16%. Only half of the effect is applied to Awakening Skills. Does not apply to Basic Attack. Cooldown: 30s.

3.desc: When "!!!!!" is entered into normal chat, Sight Focus is activated for 6s. After the effect is activated, offensive skill Damage +28%. Only half of the effect is applied to Awakening Skills. Does not apply to Basic Attack. Cooldown: 30s.

1.desc: After using skills (excluding Movement Skills and Basic Attacks), Atk. Power +0.3% for 6s. Stacks up to 6 times. When max stacks are reached, Crit Rate +5%. If Cooldown reduction due to skill cancel is applied to this effect, it is applied after the end of the skill.

2.desc: After using skills (excluding Movement Skills and Basic Attack), Atk. Power +0.6% for 6s. Stacks up to 6 times. When max stacks are reached, Crit Rate +10%. If Cooldown reduction due to skill cancel is applied to this effect, it is applied after the end of the skill.

3.desc: After using skills (excluding Movement Skills and Basic Attack), Atk. Power +1% for 6s. Stacks up to 6 times. When max stacks are reached, Crit Rate +15%. If Cooldown reduction due to skill cancel is applied to this effect, it is applied after the end of the skill.

1.desc: Holding and Casting skill Speed +5%. Damage +4%.

2.desc: Holding and Casting skill Speed +10%. Damage +10%.

3.desc: Holding and Casting skill Speed +20%. Damage +20%.

1.desc: Shield and Healing effectiveness on all Party Members +6%. If target's HP is 50% or lower, +3% additional effectiveness.

2.desc: Shield and Healing effectiveness on all Party Members +14%. If target's HP is 50% or lower, +7% additional effectiveness.

3.desc: Shield and Healing effectiveness on all Party Members +24%. If target's HP is 50% or lower, +12% additional effectiveness.

1.desc: When HP falls below 30%, gain a shield equal to 20% of Max HP for 6s. If the shield is not destroyed after 6s, recover 50% of the remaining shield as HP. (Cooldown: 300s.)

2.desc: When HP falls below 30%, gain a shield equal to 30% of Max HP for 6s. If the shield is not destroyed after 6s, recover 50% of the remaining shield as HP. (Cooldown: 240s.)

3.desc: When HP falls below 30%, gain a shield equal to 50% of Max HP for 6s. If the shield is not destroyed after 6s, recover 50% of the remaining shield as HP. (Cooldown: 180s.)

1.desc: Crit Rate +4%. Crit Damage -12%.

2.desc: Crit Rate +10%. Crit Damage -12%.

3.desc: Crit Rate +20%. Crit Damage -12%.

1.desc: Upon using Moonfall or Sunrise, gain an effect that increases the Artist's Crit Rate by <$CALC <$MACRO buffstat0_100 @1:500194/>/>% and Crit Damage by <$CALC <$MACRO buffstat1_100 @1:500194/>/>% for 60s.

2.desc: Upon using Moonfall or Sunrise, gain an effect that increases the Artist's Crit Rate by <$CALC <$MACRO buffstat0_100 @1:500195/>/>% and Crit Damage by <$CALC <$MACRO buffstat1_100 @1:500195/>/>% for 60s.

1.desc: When casting Sunrise, the energy spreads to recover HP of Party Members within 24m of the Artist and Sun Marble. It recovers up to <$CALC (<$TABLE_SKILLEFFECT ValueD 311114/>/100)/>% of the Artist's Max HP.

2.desc: When casting Sunrise, the energy spreads to recover HP of Party Members within 24m of the Artist and Sun Marble. It recovers up to <$CALC (<$TABLE_SKILLEFFECT ValueD 311119/>/100)/>% of the Artist's Max HP.

3.desc: When casting Sunrise, the energy spreads to recover HP of Party Members within 24m of the Artist and Sun Marble. It recovers up to <$CALC (<$TABLE_SKILLEFFECT ValueD 311124/>/100)/>% of the Artist's Max HP.

1.desc: Crit Rate +7% of the basic Move Speed Bonus percentage, and Crit damage +22% of the basic Atk. Speed Increase percentage. If Umbrella skill is used and then again within 3s, recover max 12% of Raindrop Meter. Sun Shower is enhanced and counts as an Umbrella skill. Sun Shower AoE radius is reduced and Raindrop Meter consumption +50%. Foes no longer receive the Atk. Power Reduction effect, but Atk. Speed and Move Speed Increase of allies +12%.

2.desc: Crit Rate +15% of the basic Move Speed Bonus percentage, and Crit damage +45% of the basic Atk. Speed Increase percentage. If Umbrella skill is used and then again within 3s, recover max 12% of Raindrop Meter. Sun Shower is enhanced and counts as an Umbrella skill. Sun Shower AoE radius is reduced and Raindrop Meter consumption +50%. Foes no longer receive the Atk. Power Reduction effect, but Atk. Speed and Move Speed Increase of allies +12%.

3.desc: Crit Rate +30% of the basic Move Speed Bonus percentage, and Crit damage +90% of the basic Atk. Speed Increase percentage. If Umbrella skill is used and then again within 3s, recover max 12% of Raindrop Meter. Sun Shower is enhanced and counts as an Umbrella skill. Sun Shower AoE radius is reduced and Raindrop Meter consumption +50%. Foes no longer receive the Atk. Power Reduction effect, but Atk. Speed and Move Speed Increase of allies +12%.

1.desc: Sun Shower's Raindrop Meter consumption decreases by 50%. While Sun Shower is active, damage dealt by Weather skills increases by 7%.

2.desc: Sun Shower's Raindrop Meter consumption decreases by 50%. While Sun Shower is active, damage dealt by Weather skills increases by 15%.

3.desc: Sun Shower's Raindrop Meter consumption decreases by 50%. While Sun Shower is active, damage dealt by Weather skills increases by 30%.

1.desc: Fury Meter +3% and MP +1% when hitting an enemy and absorbing their Vigor. (Cooldown: 1s) In Burst Mode, Crit Damage +10% and gain Fatigue every 3s. Fatigue: Fury Meter Consumption +10% every 3s, and cannot use Bloodlust. When Burst Mode ends, the duration of Exhaustion will be reduced according to the stacks of Fatigue. The Fury Meter is fully recovered when Exhaustion ends.

2.desc: Fury Meter +6% and MP +2% when hitting an enemy and absorbing their Vigor. (Cooldown: 1s) In Burst Mode, Crit Damage +25% and gain Fatigue every 3s. Fatigue: Fury Meter Consumption +10% every 3s, and cannot use Bloodlust. When Burst Mode ends, the duration of Exhaustion will be reduced according to the stacks of Fatigue. The Fury Meter is fully recovered when Exhaustion ends.

3.desc: Fury Meter +10% and MP +3% when hitting an enemy and absorbing their Vigor. (Cooldown: 1s) In Burst Mode, Crit Damage +40% and gain Fatigue every 3s. Fatigue: Fury Meter Consumption +10% every 3s, and cannot use Bloodlust. When Burst Mode ends, the duration of Exhaustion will be reduced according to the stacks of Fatigue. The Fury Meter is fully recovered when Exhaustion ends.

1.desc: Damage +7% while in Burst Mode and Bloodlust Crit Rate +5%. Fury Meter gain -25% and Burst duration -50%. When Burst ends, Exhaustion does not occur.

2.desc: Damage +15% while in Burst Mode and Bloodlust Crit Rate +10%. Fury Meter gain -25% and Burst duration -50%. When Burst ends, Exhaustion does not occur.

3.desc: Damage +25% while in Burst Mode and Bloodlust Crit Rate +20%. Fury Meter gain -25% and Burst duration -50%. When Burst ends, Exhaustion does not occur.

1.desc: Crit Rate +3%. Upon using Soul Stone, recover Possession Meter by 5%. Upon entering while in Deathlord Mode, the cooldown of Deathlord Skills resets and Deathlord Skills's Damage while in Deathlord Mode +5%, Deathlord Skills's cooldown -50%.

2.desc: Crit Rate +8%. Upon using Soul Stone, recover Possession Meter by 5%. Upon entering while in Deathlord Mode, the cooldown of Deathlord Skills resets and Deathlord Skills's Damage while in Deathlord Mode +10%, Deathlord Skills's cooldown -60%.

3.desc: Crit Rate +14%. Upon using Soul Stone, recover Possession Meter by 5%. Upon entering while in Deathlord Mode, the cooldown of Deathlord Skills resets and Deathlord Skills's Damage while in Deathlord Mode +15%, Deathlord Skills's cooldown -70%.

1.desc: Possession Meter turns into Edge Meter, disabling Deathlord Mode. Edge Meter increases upon using Deathlord Skills. When the Edge Meter is full, Deathlord Skills are disabled for 12s, but Ghast Skills are enhanced. Using Deathlord Skills does not consume Soul Stones. However, upon gathering 3 Soul Stones, instead of consuming all, the enhanced Deathlord Skills are used. Ghast and Deathlord Skills's Damage +20%. Additionally, the enhanced Deathlord Skills's Damage +25%.

2.desc: Possession Meter turns into Edge Meter, disabling Deathlord Mode. Edge Meter increases upon using Deathlord Skills. When the Edge Meter is full, Deathlord Skills are disabled for 12s, but Ghast Skills are enhanced. Using Deathlord Skills does not consume Soul Stones. However, upon gathering 3 Soul Stones, instead of consuming all, the enhanced Deathlord Skills are used. Ghast and Deathlord Skills's Damage +30%. Additionally, the enhanced Deathlord Skills's Damage +35%.

3.desc: Possession Meter turns into Edge Meter, disabling Deathlord Mode. Edge Meter increases upon using Deathlord Skills. When the Edge Meter is full, Deathlord Skills are disabled for 12s, but Ghast Skills are enhanced. Using Deathlord Skills does not consume Soul Stones. However, upon gathering 3 Soul Stones, instead of consuming all, the enhanced Deathlord Skills are used. Ghast and Deathlord Skills's Damage +40%. Additionally, the enhanced Deathlord Skills's Damage +50%.

1.desc: Outgoing Damage +2%, Brawl King Stance's duration changed to 15s. When in Brawl King Stance, recovers 3 Stamina and Shock Energy every 1s. Atk. Speed +20%. During Brawl King Stance, "Brawl King Twelve Forms: Falling Blossoms" skill is enabled. Brawl King Twelve Forms: Falling Blossoms Damage +20%, Crit Rate +15%. On skill use, outgoing Damage +4% per 1 Shock Energy.

2.desc: Outgoing Damage +8%, Brawl King Stance's duration changed to 15s. When in Brawl King Stance, recovers 4 Stamina and Shock Energy every 1s. Atk. Speed +20%. During Brawl King Stance, "Brawl King Twelve Forms: Falling Blossoms" skill is enabled. Brawl King Twelve Forms: Falling Blossoms Damage +50%, Crit Rate +15%. On skill use, outgoing Damage +4% per 1 Shock Energy.

3.desc: Outgoing Damage +14%, Brawl King Stance's duration changed to 15s. When in Brawl King Stance, recovers 5 Stamina and Shock Energy every 1s. Atk. Speed +20%. During Brawl King Stance, "Brawl King Twelve Forms: Falling Blossoms" skill is enabled. Brawl King Twelve Forms: Falling Blossoms Damage +80%, Crit Rate +15%. On skill use, outgoing Damage +4% per 1 Shock Energy.

1.desc: Total Stamina and Shock Energy -30%. Press <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT> to gain Defensive Speculation effect. When Defensive Speculation is used, gain Push Immunity for 2s, gain Shield 40% of Max HP, Incoming Damage -20%. After Defensive Speculation is used, enter into Fighting Spirit Absorption state for 10s and cannot use Defensive Speculation. Tenacious Power changes to Asura Energy, gaining 4% when using Shock Skill after using Stamina Skill or using Stamina Skill after Shock Skill. When in combat, gain Fighting Spirit effect, and Brawl King Stance changes to Asura State. When entering Asura State, Fighting Spirit effect changes into Asura Destruction effect. The Movement Skill changes and Basic Attack changes into Asura Destruction Basic Attack. Asura Destruction Basic Attack Damage +160% of Crit Rate. When Fighting Spirit and Asura Destruction are in effect, Skill Damage including Awakening Skill and Basic Attack +5%, Move Speed +15%.

2.desc: Total Stamina and Shock Energy -30%. Press <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT> to gain Defensive Speculation effect. When Defensive Speculation is used, gain Push Immunity for 2s, gain Shield 40% of Max HP, Incoming Damage -20%. After Defensive Speculation is used, enter into Fighting Spirit Absorption state for 10s and cannot use Defensive Speculation. Tenacious Power changes to Asura Energy, gaining 4% when using Shock Skill after using Stamina Skill or using Stamina Skill after Shock Skill. When in combat, gain Fighting Spirit effect, and Brawl King Stance changes to Asura State. When entering Asura State, Fighting Spirit effect changes into Asura Destruction effect. The Movement Skill changes and Basic Attack changes into Asura Destruction Basic Attack. Asura Destruction Basic Attack Damage +180% of Crit Rate. When Fighting Spirit and Asura Destruction are in effect, Skill Damage including Awakening Skill and Basic Attack +15%, Move Speed +15%.

3.desc: Total Stamina and Shock Energy -30%. Press <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'><$HOTKEY 108/></FONT> to gain Defensive Speculation effect. When Defensive Speculation is used, gain Push Immunity for 2s, gain Shield 40% of Max HP, Incoming Damage -20%. After Defensive Speculation is used, enter into Fighting Spirit Absorption state for 10s and cannot use Defensive Speculation. Tenacious Power changes to Asura Energy, gaining 4% when using Shock Skill after using Stamina Skill or using Stamina Skill after Shock Skill. When in combat, gain Fighting Spirit effect, and Brawl King Stance changes to Asura State. When entering Asura State, Fighting Spirit effect changes into Asura Destruction effect. The Movement Skill changes and Basic Attack changes into Asura Destruction Basic Attack. Asura Destruction Basic Attack Damage +200% of Crit Rate. When Fighting Spirit and Asura Destruction are in effect, Skill Damage including Awakening Skill and Basic Attack +25%, Move Speed +15%.
